thread.title: Mayor de Blasio will attend pricey fundraiser for Bronx pol
thread.title_full: Mayor de Blasio will attend pricey fundraiser for Bronx pol - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Mayor de Blasio will attend pricey fundraiser for Bronx pol
text:
Seth Wenig/AP New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio arrives at City Hall in New York. ALBANY — Mayor de Blasio is set to headline a $1,000-a-head Manhattan fund-raiser Thursday for Bronx Assemblyman Luis Sepulveda, an early supporter of the mayor’s.
The hefty price tag raised some eyebrows among Democratic insiders, who note that Assembly fundraisers, particularly for a second-term backbencher, typically are no more than a few hundred dollars per person.
A source close to Sepulveda said the Democratic assemblyman is trying to build his coffers in case he decides to seek a different office in the future.
Chu, Victor, Freelance NYDN/Victor Chu Bronx Democratic County Committee DinnerAttorney and Bronx state assembly candidate Luis Sepulveda The source said he could also be trying to thwart a potential primary challenge since he is not particularly close with Bronx County Democratic leadership, including County Chairman and fellow Assemblyman Marcos Crespo, Assembly Speaker Carl Heastie, who hails from the borough, and Borough President Ruben Diaz Jr.
“If there’s going to be a challenge, he’s looking forward to throwing it back in their face,” the source said.
